name: Automated War
description:
Play as various unit types to destroy other units in various levels. Various strategies can be used. Any feedback at all is very appreciated and all of it will be considered.

Playing the tutorial is highly recommended!

Issues

Submit all issues to: https://bitbucket.org/distropiangames/automated-wa...

Credits

Programming: kenoba10

Assets and Levels: Geir

The Guy: Fred(Without this guy, the game would just not exist.)

Music: Kevin MacLeod
